2.6 Configuration Management

  • My “Configuration Management” tool of choice is Ansible (Semaphore)
  • The HomeLab uses currently the following playbooks to automate common administration tasks:
    • private github repo
Playbook Purpose
apt-upgrade Keep the infrastructure containers (Ansible, bind9) up to date.
bind9 Install and manage bind9.
nfs-server Install and manage nfs-server.
pagerduty-alerts Trigger alerts for specific actions (e.g. Server needs reboot…)
traefik Reverse Proxy and Application Gateway
